name: Gray Hummingbird
description: Gray version of Hummingbird, does work with forums now. Suggestion or comments, contact me on Twitter @FinalFateOfAll
additional_info:
4/2
*some fixes, one suggested by a user and fixed manga info page. Removed feed advert as well.

1/10
*Minor fixes, trying an orange color for links now.
*Fixed a background color issue when expanding a title in your library.

-2014-

12/3
*Some suggested fixes, thanks for the input

11/16
*Minor fixes

11/14
*General fixes and tweaks

10/13
*More forum fixes

10/7
*Fixed it for forums now too, let me know if I missed anything
*Fixed some general stuff, still need to work on a few minor things in forums

10/6
*Initial release

discussions.name: Cover images should not be removed, only dimmed.
